activity.title: coronasafe/care_fe#6945
activity.text:
Also @rithviknishad  @aparnacoronasafe  @nihal467 
I have created the required Occupation field and I inspected results in console and ensured that the occupation data is going through handleSubmit process but this data is not being saved into the database because when I again go to edit patient details the occupation field there is empty. Here is what I have done:
1) Defined OCCUPATION_TYPES in Constants.tsx
![image](https://github.com/coronasafe/care_fe/assets/129517558/e694b1e6-528b-4d09-bc6f-6bcc98f7883b)



2) Defined occupation modal as strings in models.tsx
![image](https://github.com/coronasafe/care_fe/assets/129517558/e053774b-416c-4c22-827d-49b0593e0f30)


3) Added occupation input field in patientRegister.tsx
![image](https://github.com/coronasafe/care_fe/assets/129517558/c55c546e-d59a-45bb-a587-952a9aecab82)


4) Added to Abha linking 
![image](https://github.com/coronasafe/care_fe/assets/129517558/9e303b75-bbe0-4cba-b9f5-120663eccfc8)


![image](https://github.com/coronasafe/care_fe/assets/129517558/d09f5e3a-e4e2-40a4-a8df-76b818c3942d)


5) Added to data schema in handleSubmit:
![image](https://github.com/coronasafe/care_fe/assets/129517558/db9da4d1-2069-4b0d-96c8-5c9852063b88)


6) Defined in fetchExtResultData in patientReg.tsx itself:
![image](https://github.com/coronasafe/care_fe/assets/129517558/252e8c47-f59c-4c4a-bb3a-4ebe089f98df)


Please have a look and let me know where I'm missing out which is resulting in data not being saved to database.
